description: Unaccompanied minors and sick children will be relocated from Greece, amid tensions with Turkey.
title: EU to take in some child migrants stuck in Greece
title_page: EU to take in some child migrants stuck in Greece - BBC News
maintext: Turkey has urged the EU to do much more to ease the refugee burden, as it is already housing 3.7 million Syrian refugees in camps, while another million Syrians are desperate to get in, having fled fighting in the Idlib area.
